text: 13:21 Galesia 1:5; Filipai 2:13; 2 Tesalonika 2:17; 1 Pita 5:10Ezɨ kɨ ia bagha Godɨn kam ko mɨgɨa kamaghɨn an azangsɨsi, eghtɨ a ian akuragh gavgavim ia danɨngtɨ, ia arazir aghuibar amu, egh an ifongiamɨn gɨn mangam. Eghtɨ Krais Iesusɨn ingangarimɨn tuavimɨn, an en navir averiabar aven ingartɨ, e a ifongezir arazibar amuam. Egh e zurazurara ziar ekiam a danɨng mamaghɨra ikiam. Bar guizbangɨra.
